## Setup
- Please download `class_files` from [GitHub](https://github.com/FRS417-DataScienceBiologists)
- Please open your homework in RStudio
- Open a browser window to your GitHub repository

## Group Project
- Take 5-10 minutes to decide on groups and think about a theme for our projects.
- Make a plan on doing some internet searches and select a data set that will work for your group.
- No built-in data! No small or fake data!
